bottlenecks.name: Lack of delegation and automation in low-value tasks
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Founder spending too much time on tasks that can be delegated or automated, hindering focus on high-value activities.
tactical_fix: Identify low-value tasks for delegation or automation
Implement systems and tools to streamline processes

analysis.top_recommendation: Delegate low-value tasks to free up time for high-impact activities.

proposed_kpis.why: To ensure efficient spending on acquiring new customers
To understand the long-term value generated from each customer
To measure and improve customer happiness and loyalty

analysis.summary: To increase sales in the energy drink making business, focus on delegating and automating low-value tasks to free up time for high-impact activities. Track revenue and profit per month as key performance indicators, while also monitoring customer acquisition cost, customer lifetime value, and customer satisfaction score for a comprehensive view of business performance.

bottlenecks.name: Unknown target market
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Lack of clear understanding of the target market for the energy drink
tactical_fix: Conduct market research to identify target demographics

analysis.top_recommendation: Conduct market research to identify target demographics and preferences

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the effectiveness of sales and marketing efforts
To understand the long-term value of each customer
To track the business's position in the market

analysis.summary: To increase sales for the energy drink making business, it is crucial to first identify and target the right market segment through market research and tailored marketing strategies.

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the rate of increase in sales over time
To track the cost of acquiring new customers
To understand the total value a customer brings to the business over their lifetime
